Key Match Events: Adingra received a yellow card in the 38th minute
Konate received a yellow card in the 78th minute
Pre-Game Insights: Gambia have arguably turned out their best-ever side in recent times and came into this competition with loads of confidence, having recently qualified for a third consecutive Africa Cup of Nations
The Scorpions began their qualification campaign with a 3-2 away defeat to Burundi
Ivory Coast have been unable to qualify for the last two editions of the FIFA World Cup
Jean-Louis Gasset has one of the most star-studded squads in Africa
The Elephants are ranked 52nd in the world according to the latest FIFA world rankings
This match marks their first encounter against Gambia in a decade, with their last meeting occurring in June 2013 when they secured a 3-0 away victory in a 2014 FIFA World Cup qualifier
